statements: SELECT * FROM flexible_work_arrangements;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE communication_rating > 3;
SELECT department, employee_name, work_arrangement_type FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE collaboration_rating < 4;
SELECT id, employee_name FROM flexible_work_arrangements ORDER BY department ASC, collaboration_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE department = 'IT' AND communication_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, work_arrangement_type FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE collaboration_rating > 4;
SELECT department, COUNT(id) AS total_employees FROM flexible_work_arrangements GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(id) > 2;
SELECT employee_name, communication_rating + collaboration_rating AS total_rating FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE communication_rating < 3;
SELECT CONCAT(employee_name, ' (', department, ')') AS full_info, work_arrangement_type FROM flexible_work_arrangements WHERE communication_rating < 4 ORDER BY department DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT team_name, team_size, flexible_work_arrangement FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_collaboration ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_size FROM team_collaboration WHERE flexible_work_arrangement = TRUE;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_size FROM team_collaboration WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT * FROM team_collaboration WHERE flexible_work_arrangement = TRUE;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_size FROM team_collaboration ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(team_id) AS num_teams FROM team_collaboration GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_collaboration WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours, communication_rating FROM impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT employee_id, communication_channel, message_count FROM communication_data;
SELECT team_id, team_size, team_leader, team_name FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_leader FROM team_collaboration;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours, communication_rating FROM impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements WHERE work_hours > 40;
SELECT * FROM communication_data ORDER BY message_sent_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_size, team_leader FROM team_collaboration WHERE team_size > 10;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE department='IT';
SELECT conversation_topic FROM TeamCommunication ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, calls_made FROM TeamMembers JOIN CollaborationMetrics ON TeamMembers.member_id = CollaborationMetrics.arrangement_id;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS members_count FROM TeamMembers GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE department = 'IT' AND role = 'Manager';
SELECT conversation_id, start_date, end_date FROM TeamCommunication WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WorkArrangements WHERE member_id = 5 AND start_date >= '2022-06-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT conversation_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM CollaborationMetrics GROUP BY conversation_id HAVING total_messages > 10 ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_projects WHERE team_lead = 1;
SELECT task_name, status, name AS assigned_to_name FROM project_tasks INNER JOIN team_members ON project_tasks.assigned_to = team_members.id;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, name AS sender_name, role AS sender_role FROM communication_log INNER JOIN team_members ON communication_log.sender_id = team_members.id;
SELECT project_name, communication_score, collaboration_score FROM team_projects INNER JOIN collaboration_metrics ON team_projects.id = collaboration_metrics.project_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, status FROM project_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';

SELECT project_id, AVG(communication_score) AS avg_communication_score, AVG(collaboration_score) AS avg_collaboration_score FROM collaboration_metrics GROUP BY project_id HAVING avg_communication_score > 70 AND avg_collaboration_score > 80;
